about_the_game:
A new and exciting online action RPG in development!

Join in on the epic adventure that is unfolding on the moon, Luna. The Gillamoorians, a species native to Luna for thousands of years, have noticed an uptick of Lunarian settlers arriving. They have also had encounters with another mysterious species known as the Astralites who recently started appearing. Create your adventurers and explore with friends to unfold the mysteries of Luna and the desolate planet she orbits!

Fully Online

All adventures on Luna will take place online along with other players. There is currently no offline mode that is planned. Luna will be an experience that is always evolving as new features and content become available. Player feedback will be taken into consideration as the adventurers of Luna shape our world.

Three Playable Species

Lunarians
Originally from the planet Terra, the Lunarians have only recently sought refuge on Luna having experienced a global calamity on their nearby colony. Their industrious ways should lead to quick advancement.

Gillamoorians
The Gillamoorians have lived on Luna for thousands of years. Having discovered mana early on in their history, they have experienced exponential growth due to it's miraculous properties.

Astralites
An advanced species that travels the cosmos intervening where they feel necessary. Initially they were drawn to the area by the calamity. Strangely enough, they now seem more interested with mana energy.

Action Combat

  • Four different base classes are currently planned. Warrior, Mage, Ranger, and Cleric.
  • Many abilities for each class are planned with the intention of making each class feel unique.
  • There are a variety of weapon types planned each with a different feel for you to utilize to accomplish your goals.

Trade Skills

There are a variety of trade skills that are planned. You can expect staples such as gathering, woodcutting, mining, fishing, animal husbandry, and more. Utilizing these trade skills will help you create the items you need on your journey.

movies.name: Trials of Luna Pre Alpha Trailer

name: Trials of Luna
short_description: The adventure of a lifetime awaits for you on the moon Luna. Create your own adventurer as one of the three different playable species that all cohabit this utopia that orbits a desolate planet. Be sure to team up with others on this grand adventure to conquer whatever may stand in your way.
